item.title: Bridging Model Context Protocol with Network Orchestration
item.description: How I wired an AI assistant through a custom MCP server to speak RESTCONF with Cisco NSO & keep hallucinations out of the control plane.

item.title: Hard Lessons from Small Reinforcement Learning Runs
item.description: Micro-budgets force discipline: reward shaping sanity checks, variance tracking & deliberately tiny experiments.

item.title: Shaving 40% Off Ephemeral Environment Spin-up
item.description: Layered caching, image diet, parallel provisioners & a ruthless look at “default” waits.

item.title: Design Tokens That Engineers Don’t Ignore
item.description: Actionable docs + lint rules > pretty Figma handoffs. Make the right thing the easy thing.

item.title: Focus Systems for Context-Switch Heavy Weeks
item.description: Energy budgeting > time boxing. I cluster tasks by cognitive mode & protect recovery slots.

item.title: What Actually Compounds in an Early Engineering Career
item.description: Pattern literacy, feedback loops, and naming trade-offs explicitly.
